instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-2610 PP18v5_dcin_fuse is 0v.
threads.message:
Hi

This board came as no any lqd or physical damaged.

Missing main pp18v5 power rail. tried good known dc in boards. notice when i try the charger with this logic board, charger need to plug to a different socket to work with  different mcbook.

Any idea?

threads.title: 820-2610 PP18v5_dcin_fuse is 0v.
threads.message: Hi this is sorted. bad q7060. Thank you
